languages.text: {n}Капеллан равнодушно пожимает плечами.{/n} "С расстрелами все? Я хотел бы уже решить вопрос с наследством Денза, а после — проводить его, как положено".
{n}Chaplain shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Are we done with the firing squads? I would like to finally resolve the matter of Denz's inheritance, and after that — give him a proper send-off."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан равнодушно пожимает плечами.{/n} "С расстрелами все? Я хотел бы уже решить вопрос с наследством Денза, а после — проводить его, как положено".

languages.text: {n}牧师无动于衷地耸了耸肩。{/n}“咱们的处刑结束了吗？我希望能早点解决丹兹的遗产问题，之后适当地和他道个别。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Are we done with the firing squads? I would like to finally resolve the matter of Denz's inheritance, and after that — give him a proper send-off."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师无动于衷地耸了耸肩。{/n}“咱们的处刑结束了吗？我希望能早点解决丹兹的遗产问题，之后适当地和他道个别。”

languages.text: {n}El capellán se encoge de hombros.{/n} «¿Hemos terminado con los fusilamientos? Me gustaría terminar de resolver el tema de la herencia de Denz y después despedirme de él como es debido».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Are we done with the firing squads? I would like to finally resolve the matter of Denz's inheritance, and after that — give him a proper send-off."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capellán se encoge de hombros.{/n} «¿Hemos terminado con los fusilamientos? Me gustaría terminar de resolver el tema de la herencia de Denz y después despedirme de él como es debido».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は無関心そうに肩をすくめた。{/n}「銃撃戦はもうよろしいのですか？デンツの遺産相続の問題を片づけて、彼をきちんと見送りたいのですが」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Are we done with the firing squads? I would like to finally resolve the matter of Denz's inheritance, and after that — give him a proper send-off."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は無関心そうに肩をすくめた。{/n}「銃撃戦はもうよろしいのですか？デンツの遺産相続の問題を片づけて、彼をきちんと見送りたいのですが」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Sind wir fertig mit den Exekutionskommandos? Ich würde gerne endlich die Angelegenheit mit Denz' Erbschaft klären und ihn danach ... angemessen verabschieden."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Are we done with the firing squads? I would like to finally resolve the matter of Denz's inheritance, and after that — give him a proper send-off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester zuckt gleichgültig mit den Schultern.{/n} "Sind wir fertig mit den Exekutionskommandos? Ich würde gerne endlich die Angelegenheit mit Denz' Erbschaft klären und ihn danach ... angemessen verabschieden."

languages.text: {n}Avec l'indifférence la plus totale, Chapelain se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « En avons-nous fini avec toutes ces fusillades ? Je voudrais régler l'affaire de l'héritage de Denz pour pouvoir ensuite achever ses funérailles comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Are we done with the firing squads? I would like to finally resolve the matter of Denz's inheritance, and after that — give him a proper send-off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec l'indifférence la plus totale, Chapelain se contente de hausser les épaules.{/n} « En avons-nous fini avec toutes ces fusillades ? Je voudrais régler l'affaire de l'héritage de Denz pour pouvoir ensuite achever ses funérailles comme il se doit. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz, umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Kurşuna dizme seremonisi bitti mi? Denz'in vasiyeti konusunu bir an önce çözmek ve onu düzgün bir şekilde son yolculuğuna uğurlamak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs indifferently.{/n} "Are we done with the firing squads? I would like to finally resolve the matter of Denz's inheritance, and after that — give him a proper send-off."
